sentences.english: Instead of being judgmental, we too should be accepting of sexuality in the later years.
sentences.chinese: 我們也應該接受年紀大的人的性事，而不應該去批判。
古典音樂的聽衆年紀可能大一些。

sentences.english: I have been over the age of intoxication in cajolery.
sentences.chinese: 我已經過了喜歡聽甜言蜜語的年紀。

sentences.english: He was rather elderly with clear blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他上了年紀，有雙明亮的藍眼睛。

sentences.english: Children at that age are only copies of their mother.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們，在那種小小年紀總是母親的再版。

sentences.english: I highly recommend it as a soothing, enjoyable CD for kids of all ages.
sentences.chinese: 我高度推薦這張柔和的CD給任何年紀的寶寶。

sentences.english: These baby birds are so young that they don't even have their feathers.
sentences.chinese: 這些雛鳥年紀還很小，甚至還沒長羽毛。

sentences.english: An elderly man visits the doctor for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 一個上了年紀的男人請醫生爲他作健康檢查。

sentences.english: Your father takes on too much. He forgets he's not growing any younger.
sentences.chinese: 你父親太易激動，他忘記自己上了年紀。

sentences.english: No one should be alone in their old age, he thought.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不該上了年紀獨個兒待着，他想。

sentences.english: Lilith had witnessed horrors no one her young age should ever see.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉絲目擊了她這個年紀的年輕人不該見到的恐怖。

sentences.english: Older web users - 'silver surfers' - are doing precisely this.
sentences.chinese: 年紀大的上網者就在做大腦運動。

sentences.english: As I get old day by day, I really find the speed of sand lapsing in my sandglass accelerated.
sentences.chinese: 隨着人年紀增長，我覺得時間的沙漏好像越流越快。

sentences.english: On a hot summer day an elderly gentleman faints in the street. A small
sentences.chinese: 在一個炎熱的夏天，一位上了年紀的男子昏倒在街頭。

sentences.english: When you get older， crow‘s feet often form around your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你年紀大的時候，魚尾紋常常會在你的眼周顯現。

definition: how old are you? (familiar, or to a child)
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
